moves.name: X Attack All
moves.effect: Sharply raises the Attack of all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Strike Together!
moves.effect: Raises the Attack and Speed of all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Giga Drain
moves.effect: Restores the user’s HP based on the amount of damage dealt to the target.

passives.name: Antitoxin
passives.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned or badly poisoned.

passives.name: Natural Remedy
passives.description: Once per battle, removes all status conditions from the user when the user is inflicted by any status condition.

passives.name: Master Healer 1
passives.description: Increases the amount of HP restored by the user’s healing moves.
